mapper.select: SELECT save_name, save_amount, save_created_date, save_target_date FROM savings_plan WHERE member_in = #{memberIn} ORDER BY save_created_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT save_name, save_amount, save_created_date, save_target_date FROM savings_plan WHERE member_in = #{memberIn} AND YEAR(save_created_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(save_created_date) = #{month} ORDER BY save_created_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = TRUE THEN expense_sum ELSE 0 END), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = FALSE THEN expense_sum ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM expense WHERE member_in = #{memberIn} AND expense_date <= LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0'), '-01'), '%Y-%m-%d'))

SELECT save_amount FROM savings_plan WHERE save_created_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AND LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND member_in = #{memberIn} ORDER BY save_created_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO savings_plan ( member_in, save_name, save_created_date, save_target_date, save_amount ) VALUES ( #{memberIn}, #{saveName}, #{saveCreatedDate}, #{saveTargetDate}, #{saveAmount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE savings_plan t1 JOIN ( SELECT save_in FROM savings_plan WHERE member_in = #{memberIn} AND YEAR(save_created_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND MONTH(save_created_date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) ORDER BY save_created_date DESC, save_in DESC LIMIT 1 ) t2 ON t1.save_in = t2.save_in SET t1.save_feedback = #{saveFeedback}

UPDATE savings_plan t1 JOIN ( SELECT save_in FROM savings_plan WHERE member_in = #{memberIn} AND YEAR(save_created_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND MONTH(save_created_date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) ORDER BY save_created_date DESC, save_in DESC LIMIT 1 ) t2 ON t1.save_in = t2.save_in SET t1.bud_feedback = #{budFeedback}
